short_summary: Business Process Consultant, Senior - Development, Implementation, Preparation and Maintenance of SAP Financial Process Transformation Initiatives.
description: The Department of National Defence has a need for Task Based Professional Services, specifically one (1) Business Process Consultant (Senior - Level 3) for the development, implementation, preparation, and maintenance of SAP Financial Process Transformation Initiatives. This requirement is open only to those Supply Arrangement Holders under E60ZT-18TSPS who qualified under Tier 1 for the following category: 2.5 - Business Process Consultant (Senior)
